review: i downloded this game when it first appeared on the internet for free. even though it was free it still was a fantastic game. i then voted for it on greenlight and what do u know it appears on steam, i bought the game for $4.25 on the steam sales. it was even better even though its still was just a beta. i highly recommend this game to people who have wanted a world war 1 first person shooter.
